Producer: Gia Walsh, Ari Issler, Elizabeth Rodriguez, Vince Jolivette, Ben Snyder, Paul Jarrett, Kara Baker
Production Co: Gigi Films, Filmopoly, Washington Square Films
Synopsis: Three Nuyorican sisters navigate the daunting life challenges of single motherhood, career, and family, all while finding humor and solace within the bond of sisterhood.
Title: Allswell in New York
